member.name: D3D12_SERIALIZED_DATA_DRIVER_MATCHING_IDENTIFIER
member.summary: Opaque data structure describing driver versioning for a serialized acceleration structure. Pass this structure into a call to to determine if a previously serialized acceleration structure is compatible with the current driver/device, and can therefore be deserialized and used for raytracing.

member.name: D3D12_SERIALIZED_DATA_DRIVER_MATCHING_IDENTIFIER.DriverOpaqueGUID
member.summary: The opaque identifier of the driver.
